title: Buddy Valastro's Cake Dynasty
overview: With over-the-top cakes and an over-the-top family, Buddy Valastro's Cake Dynasty goes behind the scenes at Carlo's Bake Shop alongside Buddy and his extended family as he works to balance the demands of a rapidly expanding business empire and demanding home life.With the whole family involved, the business is growing with restaurants, nationwide shipping, automated cake vending, and more while still staying true to their rootsâ€“baking thousands of cakes, Italian specialty desserts, and cookies each day while also creating the most brain-busting, innovative cakes around.
